title: Kurt Vonnegut by Bernard Gotfryd (1965)
description: Kurt Vonnegut by Bernard Gotfryd, colour transparency 35mm slide format. On mount: 71089392; Gotfryd set no.: C-720-001-A. Restoration: Colours adjusted to deal with the fading of red ink more than blue; spots and hair removed, corners sharpened up a little, cropped
attribution: Library of Congress, Prints & Photographs Division, photograph by Bernard Gotfryd, [Reproduction number e.g., LC-USZ62-12345]
